review: I was one of the first Amazon prime members to order this and it is a great value!  Easy to set up and now I can utilize my Prime Membership on my bedroom TV via HDMI port.  I considered the Chromecast and Roku but can't beat this value.  I use this for Netflix also and works just fine!
author: Joe Sid "Joe S."

review: Turned my older TV into a "smart tv".Increases number of program alternatives and provides access to additional entertainment options!
author: Stuart Stoller

review: Awesome alternative to the Roku. Cheap and easy. Full of awesome channels and programming.
author: Chris B

review: Absolutely awesome! Easy to set up, fantastic user interface! UI is a deal breaker for me and it is so well organized. No skipping, no audio dying, streaming is great quality. Best part is that I don't need the Xbox anymore.Love it!
author: va33 "va33"

review: Easy to set up and works great!  Can't see why anyone would want to buy anything else.

review: Too expensive to use. Uses up too much data to make it worth it.

review: Great, Now I will dump DISH NETWORK

review: So easy to set up!  And great options for viewing movies, TV series, etc.  What I love the most are the shows/movies for Amazon Prime customers. Make the annual Prime fee well worth the money!!!
